file.name: record_name_refactor.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - description: Localhost
    url: http://localhost:9080
info:
  title: Interceptor
  description: Interceptor Service
  version: v1
  contact:
    name: WSO2
    url: http://wso2.com/products/api-manager/
    email: architecture@wso2.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
tags:
  - name: mediation
    description: Mediation
paths:
  /handle-request:
    post:
      tags:
        - Request
      summary: Handle request mediation
      operationId: handleRequest
      requestBody:
        description: |
          Content of the request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/HandleRequest_RequestBody"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/HandleResponse_RequestBody"
  /handle-response:
    post:
      tags:
        - response
      summary: Handle Response
      operationId: handleResponse
      requestBody:
        description: |
          Content of the request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/HandleRequest_RequestBody"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/HandleResponse_RequestBody"

components:
  schemas:
    HandleRequest_RequestBody:
      title: Request/Response handler
      type: object
      properties:
        headers:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Headers"
        body:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Body"
        context:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Context"
    HandleResponse_RequestBody:
      title: Request/Response handler
      type: object
      properties:
        headersToAdd:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Headers"
        headersToRemove:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/HeaderKeys"
        headersToReplace:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Headers"
        body:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Body"
        context:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Context"
    Headers:
      title: Headers
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: string
      description: |
        Map (string-to-string dictionary) of key value pairs of headers
      example:
        content-type: application/json
        content-length: "40"
    HeaderKeys:
      title: HeaderKeys
      type: array
      items:
        type: string
      description: |
        Array of header keys
      example:
        - header-to-remove
    Body:
      type: string
      description: |
        Base64 encoded body
      example: eyJIZWxsbyI6IldvcmxkIn0K
    Context:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: string
      description: |
        Map (string-to-string dictionary) of key value pairs shared in Request and Response flow
      example:
        user-type: admin
        validation: "true"
